title: A pick-tooth for the Pope: or The pack-mans Pater Noster Set down in a dialogue, betwixt a pack-man, and a priest. Translated out of Dutch by S. I. S. and newly augmented and enlarged by his son, R. S.
author: Sempill, James, Sir, 1566-1625.
publicationStmtPublisher: by Robert Sanders, printer to the Town, and are to be sold in his shop,
